product_name: The North Face Free Course Triclimate 3-in-1 Pants - Girls'
long_description: Perfect for the young outdoor adventurer who plays outside in all kinds of conditions, The North Face Free Course Triclimate 3-in-1 pants for girls offer multiple levels of weather protection. Fully seam-sealed nylon shell pants use HyVent(TM) 2-layer coating for waterproof, breathable protection. Shell pants feature zippered hand pockets, key clip, articulated knees, zippered fly, half-elastic waistband with adjustable rip-and-stick tabs, belt loops and gripper gaiters. Grow cuffs offer a simple way to extend cuffs by 2 in. once your child starts to outgrow the pants. Comfortable fleece liner pants provide lightweight warmth in cool, dry weather or when she's lounging at the lodge after a day on the mountain. In cold, snowy weather, snap the microfleece liner pants into the shell pants for maximum warmth and protection from the elements.
